about_the_game:
The Legend pack features Tomb Raider: Legend themed skins including a golden pistol and a ring that gives your player health regeneration powers.

Key Features:


  • Lara Legend
  • Isis Legend
  • Horus Legend
  • Carter Legend
  • Gold Pistol
  • Legend Ring
detailed_description:
The Legend pack features Tomb Raider: Legend themed skins including a golden pistol and a ring that gives your player health regeneration powers.

Key Features:


  • Lara Legend
  • Isis Legend
  • Horus Legend
  • Carter Legend
  • Gold Pistol
  • Legend Ring

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz high end Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6000 series or better / NVidia GeForce 500 series or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Quad core CPU: AMD Phenom II X4 955 or Intel Core i5-750
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD R7/ NVidia GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 11
